message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I think it's a great opportunity for you to invest in something that will benefit your business. I'm willing to offer you the product for $12000. This is a competitive price considering the value it brings to your company.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. I believe it's a fair price considering the market value.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $10000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product for $11500. This is still a great deal considering the value it brings to your business.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, and I'm thinking $11000 is a more reasonable price for the product.

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I'm willing to make another concession. I'm willing to sell the product for $11250. This is a fair price considering the value it brings to your business, and I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still not convinced that $11250 is the right price. I'm willing to pay $11000, which I think is a fair price considering the market value.

I understand that you're still hesitant, Bob, but I'm not willing to go below $11500. I'm willing to make one more concession, and I'll sell the product to you for $11400. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the value it brings to your business.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still not willing to go above $11000. I'm willing to pay $11000 for the product, and I hope we can finalize the deal at this price.

I understand that you're firm on the price, Bob, but I'm not willing to sell the product at a loss. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, and I'll sell the product to you for $11200. This is the final price I'm willing to accept, considering the value it brings to your business.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still not willing to go above $11000. I'm willing to pay $11000 for the product, and I hope we can finalize the deal at this price. If not, I'll have to consider other options.
